data.title: Simon (1980 film)
data.meta_description: Simon is a 1980 American comedy film written and directed by Marshall Brickman and starring Alan Arkin. The plot concerns a university professor manipulated into thinking he is an alien from space by a think tank, whose members scheme to use him to create a media circus.
data.text:
1980 film by Marshall Brickman / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
